1. Pool Report on the Jumpball called in the final minute of the Second Overtime and the Review of the Final Shot of the Game in tonight’s Minnesota at Denver Game  Official NBA
  2. Wolves spoil Jokic's 61-point triple-double in 2OT  ESPN
  3. Nikola Jokić scores career-best 61 points in double-overtime loss to Wolves  NBA
  4. Fantasy Basketball Waiver Wire: Nickeil Alexander-Walker saves the day  Yahoo Sports
  5. Renck: Russell Westbrook Experience must be curtailed after Nuggets’ deflating loss to Timberwolves  The Denver Post
